<item>
 <title>No Indian city in list of world's best destinations for luxury retailers</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-no-indian-city-in-list-of-world-s-best-destinations-for-luxury-retailers-2211970</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>While Asia Pacific has emerged as the the favourite region for luxury retailers, no Indian city has found a place for itself on the list.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Seven out of ten cities on the top ten world&#39;s favourite destinations for luxury retailers list, put together by&nbsp;&nbsp;Jones Lang LaSalle&nbsp;(JLL) in its Destination Retail 2016 report, belong to the Asia Pacific region, however, there are no Indian cities on it.&nbsp;</p>
<p>This is the first such list by the real estate consultant, which has ranked cities according to their appeal to global luxury retailers.&nbsp;</p>
<p>London came in at the top spot and the list named three Chinese cities -- Hong Kong, Shanghai, Beijing and Taipei among the top ten.</p>
<p>Here&#39;s the top ten list</p>
<p>1. London</p>
<p>2. Hong Kong</p>
<p>3. Paris</p>
<p>4. Tokyo</p>
<p>5. New York</p>
<p>6. Shanghai</p>
<p>7. Singapore</p>
<p>8. Dubai</p>
<p>9. Beijing</p>
<p>10. Osaka</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/authors/dna-web-team">dna Web Team</a><a href="/agencies/dna-webdesk">dna webdesk</a><a href="/cities/mumbai-16">Mumbai</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/jones-lang-lasalle-jll">Jones Lang LaSalle (JLL)</a></li><li><a href="/topic/real-estate">Real Estate</a></li><li><a href="/topic/luxury-retail">luxury retail</a></li><li><a href="/topic/london">London</a></li><li><a href="/topic/shanghai">Shanghai</a></li><li><a href="/topic/singapore">Singapore</a></li><li><a href="/topic/beijing">Beijing</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-12:05pm</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 12:05pm</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Supreme Court upholds constitutional validity of penal laws on criminal defamation</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-supreme-court-upholds-constitutional-validity-of-penal-laws-on-criminal-defamation-2211963</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>In a landmark judgement with widespread ramifications, the Supreme Court on Friday upheld the constitutional validity of penal laws of defamation.</p>
<p>So in essence a person can still be jailed&nbsp;if it is proved that his/her words or actions were defamatory. &nbsp;It has dismissed a batch of petitions challenging the constitutional validity of sections 499 and 500 of the IPC providing for criminal defamation</p>
<p>SC in its verdict said, &quot;Mutual respect to each other is required to maintain the constitutional value that ensure the dignity of any individual&quot;. Even though the apex court upheld the provisions it said that magistrate has to be extremely careful while issuing summons under law.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Among the petitioners were eminent politicians like Congress vice president&nbsp;Rahul&nbsp;Gandhi, Delhi Chief Minister&nbsp;Arvind&nbsp;Kejriwal&nbsp;and&nbsp;Bharatiya&nbsp;Janata&nbsp;Party (BJP) leader&nbsp;Subramanian&nbsp;Swamy.</p>
<p>Deciding pleas of Rahul Gandhi, Arvind Kejriwal,Subramanian Swamy and others, SC says it will be open to them to move HC against summons issued in defamation cases. SC also said, &quot;&nbsp;Till they move HC within 8 weeks, interim protection to&nbsp;continue and criminal proceedings to remain stayed before trial court&quot;.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The petitioners earlier had argued that the criminal defamation under these sections of the&nbsp;IPC&nbsp;travelled beyond constitution&#39;s article 19(2) that imposes reasonable restriction on the freedom of speech and expression.&nbsp;The verdict was reserved on August 13 last year after bench of Justice&nbsp;Dipak&nbsp;Misra&nbsp;and Justice&nbsp;Prafulla&nbsp;C. Pant heard the matter spread over a month.</p>
<p>Swamy&nbsp;and Gandhi have been charged with criminal defamation under Sections 499 and 500 of the&nbsp;IPC&nbsp;for their political speeches made in Tamil&nbsp;Nadu&nbsp;and&nbsp;Maharashtra&nbsp;respectively, while&nbsp;Kejriwal&nbsp;is facing cases under the same provisions lodged by&nbsp;BJP&#39;s&nbsp;Nitin&nbsp;Gadkari&nbsp;and others.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/india">India</a><a href="/agencies/agencies">Agencies</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/supreme-court">Supreme Court</a></li><li><a href="/topic/rahul-gandhi">Rahul Gandhi</a></li><li><a href="/topic/arvind-kejriwal">Arvind Kejriwal</a></li><li><a href="/topic/subramanian-swamy">Subramanian Swamy</a></li><li><a href="/topic/nitin-gadkari">Nitin Gadkari</a></li><li><a href="/topic/dipak-mishra">Dipak Mishra</a></li><li><a href="/topic/indian-penal-code-ipc">Indian Penal Code (IPC)</a></li><li><a href="/topic/criminal-defamation">criminal defamation</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:55am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:55am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Solar Impulse 2 continues its record-breaking flight</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/scitech/report-solar-impulse-2-continues-its-record-breaking-flight-2211962</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Solar Impulse 2 plane took off from Phoenix, Arizona en route to Oklahoma on Thursday, resuming its record-breaking quest to circle the globe without consuming a drop of fuel.</p>
<p>The experimental solar-powered aircraft, piloted by Swiss adventurer Bertrand Piccard, took off at 3:00 am (1000 GMT), live footage showed, for the latest stage of its around-the-world flight aimed at drawing attention to clean energy technologies.</p>
<p>&quot;Goodbye Phoenix, thank you for your warm and friendly welcome,&quot; Piccard tweeted from the cockpit.</p>
<p>The flight to the city of Tulsa is expected to take 17 and a half hours.</p>
<p>The plane is set to make one or two more stops in the United States before finally landing in New York City, in the latest leg of a journey that kicked off in Abu Dhabi on March 9, 2015.</p>
<p>&quot;The objective is to reach New York as soon as possible!&quot; the Solar Impulse 2 team said in a statement Wednesday, although it is not clear when the plane might reach there.</p>
<p>The aircraft was grounded in July last year when its batteries suffered problems halfway through its 21,700-mile (35,000-kilometer) circumnavigation.</p>
<p>The crew took several months to repair the damage from high tropical temperatures during the flight&#39;s final Pacific stage, a 4,000-mile (6,437-kilometer) flight between Nagoya, Japan and Hawaii.</p>
<p>The plane was flown on that stage by Piccard&#39;s teammate Andre Borschberg, whose 118-hour journey smashed the previous record of 76 hours and 45 minutes set by US adventurer Steve Fossett in 2006.</p>
<p>The Solar Impulse 2&#39;s wings, wider than those of a Boeing 747, contain 17,000 solar cells that power the aircraft&#39;s propellers and charge batteries.</p>
<p>At night, the plane runs on stored energy.</p>
<p>The typical flight speed is around 30 miles (45 kilometers) an hour, which can increase to double that when exposed to full sunlight.</p>
<p>After crossing the United States, the pilots are set to make a trans-Atlantic flight to Europe, from where they plan to make their way back to their point of departure in Abu Dhabi.</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/scitech">Sci/Tech</a><a href="/agencies/afp-relax-news-0">AFP Relax News</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/solar-impulse-2">Solar Impulse 2</a></li><li><a href="/topic/arizona">Arizona</a></li><li><a href="/topic/phoenix">Phoenix</a></li><li><a href="/topic/oklahoma">Oklahoma</a></li><li><a href="/topic/record-breaking-flight">record-breaking flight</a></li><li><a href="/topic/bertrand-piccard">Bertrand Piccard</a></li><li><a href="/topic/solar-powered-planes">Solar powered planes</a></li><li><a href="/topic/technology">Technology</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:54am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:54am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Atleast 12 killed in firing at Iraqi city of Balad</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/world/report-atleast-12-killed-in-firing-at-iraqi-city-of-balad-2211960</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Three gunmen opened fire on a popular cafe in the northern Iraqi town of Balad overnight, killing at least 12 people and wounding 25, police and hospital sources said on Friday.</p>
<p>The attack on the mainly Shi&#39;ite town 80 km (50 miles) north of Baghdad lasted for around 10 minutes during the start of the weekend in Iraq.&nbsp;The area is heavily secured, requiring the attackers to pass three police checkpoints before reaching their target, said police sources who declined to be identified as they were not authorised to speak to the media.</p>
<p>The shooting follows the <a href="http://www.dnaindia.com/world/report-at-least-13-killed-in-suicide-bomb-attack-near-baghdad-iraq-officials-2211064" target="_blank">bloodiest attacks</a> in the capital on Wednesday, when bombings claimed by Islamic State killed at least 80 people.</p>
<p>	&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/world">World</a><a href="/agencies/reuters">Reuters</a><a href="/cities/baghdad">Baghdad</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/iraq">Iraq</a></li><li><a href="/topic/shooting">shooting</a></li><li><a href="/topic/islamic-state">Islamic State</a></li><li><a href="/topic/baghdad">Baghdad</a></li><li><a href="/topic/attack">attack</a></li><li><a href="/topic/firing">firing</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-12:06pm</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 12:06pm</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Money Laundering case: Will Chhagan Bhujbal get bail today?</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-money-laundering-case-will-chhagan-bhujbal-get-bail-today-2211955</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The special court for Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) is likely to pronounce its verdict on the bail plea filed by Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) leader and former Maharashtra minister Chhagan Bhujbal who has been arrested in a money laundering case in connection with the alleged Maharashtra Sadan scam.</p>
<p>The court had on Wednesday extended the judicial custody of Bhujbal and his nephew Sameer Bhujbal till May 25. Special Judge of the PMLA court, PR Bhavke heard the arguments of lawyers of Bhujbal and Enforcement Directorate before reserving the order.</p>
<p>The Enforcement Directorate had last week arrested Chhagan Bhujbal&#39;s associate and chartered accountant Sunil Naik in connection with the case.&nbsp;The special PMLA court had earlier issued a non-bailable warrant against Naik, who was the CA at Bhujbal- owned Mumbai Education Trust (MET) at Bandra.</p>
<p>The Enforcement Directorate is probing Bhujbal, his son Pankaj and nephew Sameer in the case concerning a contract the former allegedly gave a builder in 2005 without inviting tenders when he was the state&#39;s PWD minister. Earlier, a special trial court issued a non-bailable warrant against Pankaj Bhujbal and 28 others accused in a Rs&nbsp;800 crore money laundering case.</p>
<p>The Maharashtra Anti-Corruption Bureau had earlier filed two FIRs against the Bhujbals and others under the provisions of the PMLA to probe the Delhi-based Maharashtra Sadan scam and the Kalina land grabbing case.&nbsp;</p>

<item>
 <title>Saudi Arabia's Aramco finalises IPO options; plans global expansion</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-saudi-arabia-s-aramco-finalises-ipo-options-and-plans-global-expansion-2211952</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Global demand Saudi Arabia&#39;s state-owned oil giant&nbsp;Aramco&nbsp;is finalising proposals for its partial privatisation and will present them to its Supreme Council soon, its chief executive said about the centrepiece of the kingdom&#39;s efforts to overhaul its economy.</p>
<p>The company has a huge team working on the options for the initial public offering (IPO) of less than 5% of its value, which include a single domestic listing and a dual listing&nbsp;with&nbsp;a foreign market, CEO&nbsp;Amin&nbsp;Nasser&nbsp;said on Tuesday.</p>
<p>They will be presented &quot;soon&quot; to&nbsp;Aramco&#39;s&nbsp;Supreme Council, headed by Deputy Crown Prince Mohammed bin&nbsp;Salman, who is leading an economic reform drive to address falling oil revenue and sharp fiscal deficits by boosting the private sector, ending government waste and diversifying the economy.</p>
<p>Nasser&nbsp;stressed that even after the listing, the Saudi government would retain sole control over&nbsp;Aramco&#39;s&nbsp;oil and gas output levels. &quot;Production is sovereign,&quot; he said.</p>
<p>Riyadh has traditionally kept an expensive &quot;spare cushion&quot; of excess production capacity, allowing it to raise or reduce levels to influence prices according to the government&#39;s market strategy. Private oil companies, by contrast, do not hold back output for strategic gain.</p>
<div class="col-xs-12 col-md-4 col-lg-4  col-sm-12" id="glance" style="width: 50%;float:left;padding-right: 10px;margin-right: 10px;">
<div class="panel panel-default" style="padding: 0px;background-color: #ededed;border: 2px solid #fdfae5;box-shadow: 1px 1px 10px #b8b6b6;">
<div class="panel-body">
<div class="atGlance" style="background-color: #ffc20e;width: 64%;font-size: 19px;font-weight: 600;padding-left: 9px;">AT A GLANCE</div>
<div class="atGlaPadding" style="margin-top: 15px;">
<ul style="font-size: 16px;">
<li><span class="apple-converted-space">Aramco&nbsp;changes central to overhaul of Saudi economy</span></li>
<li><span class="apple-converted-space">IPO&nbsp;proposals for sale of less than 5% to come soon&nbsp;</span></li>
<li><span class="apple-converted-space">Firm looking at US, India, Indonesia, Vietnam and China</span></li>
<li>Oil output levels will stay as government decision</li>
<li>Global oil demand seen growing at 1.2 mn&nbsp;bpd this year</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<p>Nasser&nbsp;also said&nbsp;Aramco&nbsp;was seeking to expand globally via joint ventures in Asia and North America.</p>
<p>&quot;We are looking at the current market status that, even though challenging, is an excellent opportunity for growth,&quot;&nbsp;Nasser&nbsp;said, adding that he was looking at opportunities in the United States, India, Indonesia, Vietnam and China.</p>
<p>The CEO was speaking to reporters during a rare media visit to the company&#39;s extensive, well-guarded Dhahran headquarters, located near where American oilmen first struck the Arabian Peninsula&#39;s enormous crude reserves at Well Number 7 in 1938.</p>
<p>Besides proposing to sell a stake in the company, which would require it to release sensitive reserves data, Riyadh has asked&nbsp;Aramco&nbsp;to play a big role in developing industrial projects aimed at stimulating non-oil economic sectors.</p>
<p>Last month, Prince Mohammed said he expected the&nbsp;IPO&nbsp;would value&nbsp;Aramco&nbsp;at at least $2 trillion, but that he thought the figure might end up being higher. Any valuation would account for both oil price expectations and the size of Saudi Arabia&#39;s proven oil reserves.<br />
	&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Growing Demand</h3>
<p>Company officials said Saudi Arabia had discovered a total of 805.6 billion barrels of oil, of which 141.5 billion had already been produced and 260 billion barrels were considered &quot;proven&quot;, the industry term for reserves that can definitely be extracted.</p>
<p>Aramco&nbsp;also had 403 billion barrels of reserves it could probably extract, they said, adding that it hoped to add another 100 billion barrels to total reserves by 2025 by increasing the recovery rate by 50-70% using new technology.</p>
<p>Aramco&nbsp;expects global crude oil demand to grow by 1.2 million barrels per day this year, he&nbsp;said and has seen increasing demand in the United States and India.</p>
<p>&quot;We will meet the call on Saudi&nbsp;Aramco,&quot;&nbsp;Nasser&nbsp;said, adding that the company will increase capacity in future if needed, but that for the time being its maximum sustainable capacity would stay at 12 million&nbsp;bpd, with a total&nbsp;capacity of 12.5 million&nbsp;bpd.</p>
<p>Saudi&nbsp;Aramco&nbsp;produced an average of 10.2 million&nbsp;bpd&nbsp;of crude in 2015, he said, adding there had been a big drop in oil output among non-conventional and even other conventional producers.</p>
<p>The expansion of the&nbsp;Khurais&nbsp;oilfield&nbsp;will come on stream in 2018, he said, adding that the latest stage of its expansion project at the southeastern&nbsp;Shaybah&nbsp;oil field would be finished &quot;in a couple of weeks&quot;.</p>
<p>The increased capacity of 250,000&nbsp;bpd, taking&nbsp;Shaybah&#39;s&nbsp;total production capacity to 1 million&nbsp;bpd, is aimed at&nbsp;rebalancing&nbsp;Saudi Arabia&#39;s crude oil quality and at compensating for falling output at other fields as they mature.</p>
<p>The immense Saudi&nbsp;Aramco&nbsp;complex in Dhahran resembles a small city, with its large residential complex, its own hospital, sports stadium and parks.</p>
<p>Inside a sleek control room, technicians monitored huge screens that showed via digital graphics the core elements of the business, from the progress of oil tankers across the oceans to the available crude grades and refining facilities.</p>
<p>At&nbsp;Aramco&#39;s&nbsp;research centre nearby, officials showed reporters &quot;the cave&quot;, a colourful virtual representation on wraparound screens of drilling operations under the&nbsp;Shaybah&nbsp;oil field.</p>
<p>	Industrialisation</p>
<p>Aramco&#39;s&nbsp;continued investment in downstream industry is seen as a crucial element of economic diversification plans. One example of this is its plans to sign an agreement soon with Saudi Basic Industries&nbsp;Corp&nbsp;(Sabic), the state-run petrochemical and metals conglomerate, to jointly develop an oil-to-chemicals project, an official said in a briefing to reporters.</p>
<p>The project, likely to cost up to $30 billion, would chime with efforts to better integrate the kingdom&#39;s energy and industrial sectors. On Saturday a new Energy, Industry and Mineral Resources Ministry was created in place of the old oil ministry.</p>
<p>Another example is its huge ship repair and shipbuilding complex that it is developing at&nbsp;Ras&nbsp;al-Khair&nbsp;on the kingdom&#39;s east coast to be fully operational by 2021,&nbsp;Nasser&nbsp;said.</p>
<p>The first part of the shipbuilding complex will be ready by 2018, and it will eventually make oil rigs and tankers,&nbsp;Nasser&nbsp;said.</p>
<p>A presentation by the company said the complex would create 80,000 jobs and allow Saudi Arabia to reduce its imports by $12&nbsp;billion while increasing the country&#39;s gross domestic product by $17 billion.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/agencies/reuters">Reuters</a><a href="/cities/dahran">Dahran</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/saudi-aramco">Saudi Aramco</a></li><li><a href="/topic/saudi-arabia">Saudi Arabia</a></li><li><a href="/topic/china">China</a></li><li><a href="/topic/indonesia">Indonesia</a></li><li><a href="/topic/riyadh">Riyadh</a></li><li><a href="/topic/united-states">United States</a></li><li><a href="/topic/sabic">SABIC</a></li><li><a href="/topic/oil">OIL</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:55am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:55am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">
  <div class="content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-article-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img class="img-responsive" src="http://static.dnaindia.com/sites/default/files/styles/half/public/2016/05/13/459888-oil-getty.png" width="640" height="360" alt="Representational Image" title="Representational Image" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-article-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Representational Image</div></div></div><a href="/agencies/getty-images">Getty Images</a>  </div>

<item>
 <title>SC to pronounce verdict on pleas challenging criminal defamation today</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-sc-to-pronounce-verdict-on-pleas-challenging-criminal-defamation-today-2211950</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&nbsp;The Supreme Court will on Friday pronounce its verdict on a batch of petitions including by Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal and Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader Subramanian Swamy challenging the constitutional validity of Sections 499 and 500 of the Indian Penal Code (IPC) providing for criminal defamation.</p>
<p>The petitioners had argued that the criminal defamation under these sections of the IPC travelled beyond constitution&#39;s article 19(2) that imposes reasonable restriction on the freedom of speech and expression.<br />
	The verdict was reserved on August 13 last year after bench of Justice Dipak Misra and Justice Prafulla C. Pant heard the matter spread over a month.</p>
<p>Swamy and Gandhi have been charged with criminal defamation under Sections 499 and 500 of the IPC for their political speeches made in Tamil Nadu and Maharashtra respectively, while Kejriwal is facing cases under the same provisions lodged by BJP&#39;s Nitin Gadkari and others.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/india">India</a><a href="/agencies/ani">ANI</a><a href="/cities/new-delhi-29">New Delhi</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/supreme-court">Supreme Court</a></li><li><a href="/topic/rahul-gandhi">Rahul Gandhi</a></li><li><a href="/topic/arvind-kejriwal">Arvind Kejriwal</a></li><li><a href="/topic/subramanian-swamy">Subramanian Swamy</a></li><li><a href="/topic/nitin-gadkari">Nitin Gadkari</a></li><li><a href="/topic/dipak-mishra">Dipak Mishra</a></li><li><a href="/topic/indian-penal-code-ipc">Indian Penal Code (IPC)</a></li><li><a href="/topic/criminal-defamation">criminal defamation</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:25am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:25am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

    <div class="field field-name-field-article-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img class="img-responsive" src="http://static.dnaindia.com/sites/default/files/styles/half/public/2016/05/13/459887-428941-supreme-court.jpg" width="640" height="360" alt="Supreme Court" title="Supreme Court" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-article-image-caption field-type-text-long field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Supreme Court</div></div></div>  </div>

<item>
 <title>Donald Trump renounces ex-butler Anthony Senecal after he called for Obama's murder</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/world/report-donald-trump-renounces-ex-butler-anthony-senecal-after-he-called-for-obama-s-murder-2211949</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>United States Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has disavowed his former butler Anthony Senecal, after he posted on Facebook that he wants President Barack Obama to be killed.</p>
<p>According to CNN, Anthony Senecal, who served as Trump&#39;s butler for 17 years wrote in a Facebook post that Obama &quot;should have been taken out by our military and shot as an enemy agent in his first term,&quot; according to Mother Jones, which first reported on Senecal&#39;s post.&nbsp;Senecal, 84, confirmed he wrote the post to CNN, but disputed one point, &quot;I think I said hung.</p>
<p>&quot;Either way, I don&#39;t care. Hanging, shooting -- I&#39;d prefer he&#39;d be hung from the portico of the White House, or as I call it, the white mosque. Does it sound like I&#39;m nuts? Because I&#39;m not,&quot; he said. &quot;I&#39;ve just gotten fed up with him (Obama).&quot; Senecal said.&nbsp;Trump&#39;s campaign disavowed the &quot;horrible statements&quot; in a statement Thursday afternoon.</p>
<p>&quot;Tony Senecal has not worked at Mar-a-Lago for years, but nevertheless we totally and completely disavow the horrible statements made by him regarding the President,&quot; campaign spokeswoman Hope Hicks said.&nbsp;Senecal wrote at least a dozen similarly provocative posts on Facebook insulting Obama and calling for him to be hanged. He has also targeted Clinton, calling her a &quot;lying b----&quot; and referring to her as &quot;killery.&quot;<br />
	Senecal most recently saw Trump about one month ago and said that he spoke briefly with him about his successful presidential campaign.&nbsp;<br />
	&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/world">World</a><a href="/agencies/ani">ANI</a><a href="/cities/washington-12">Washington</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/donald-trump">Donald Trump</a></li><li><a href="/topic/anthony-senecal">Anthony Senecal</a></li><li><a href="/topic/barack-obama">Barack Obama</a></li><li><a href="/topic/republican-party">Republican Party</a></li><li><a href="/topic/facebook">Facebook</a></li><li><a href="/topic/us-presidential-elections-2016">US Presidential Elections 2016</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:35am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:35am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">
  <div class="content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-article-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img class="img-responsive" src="http://static.dnaindia.com/sites/default/files/styles/half/public/2016/05/13/459890-454279-trump-reuters.jpg" width="640" height="360" alt="Donald Trump" title="Donald Trump" /></div></div></div>  </div>
</div>
</div></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-short-url field-type-text field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Short URL:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">dnai.in/dmy5</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-embargo field-type-list-boolean field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Embargo:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-syndicate field-type-list-boolean field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Syndicate:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-hide-lead-image field-type-list-boolean field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Hide lead image:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-page-views field-type-number-integer field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Page views:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">160</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-print-edition field-type-list-boolean field-label-above"><div class="field-label">From Print Edition:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></div></description>

<item>
 <title>Finance Ministry wants clarification on black money scheme by May 25</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-finance-ministry-seek-clarification-on-black-money-scheme-by-may-25-2211947</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>With the scheme for domestic black money holders to come clean by paying tax and penalty set to become operational from June 1, the Finance Ministry on Thursday asked the public to seek clarifications on it by May 25.</p>
<p>The Income Declaration Scheme, 2016 provides an opportunity to persons who have not paid full tax in the past to come forward and declare the undisclosed income and pay tax, surcharge and penalty totalling in all to 45% of such undisclosed income so declared.</p>
<p>&quot;The stake holders and the general public are requested to bring out issues/points which in their opinion would require further clarification/guidance.</p>
<p>In his Budget speech, Finance Minister Arun Jaitley had said a four-month window would be provided for people to declare undisclosed income with an option to pay the amount due within two months of the declaration.</p>
<p>Disclosures made will be kept secret with the addition of Sections 138 and 119 of the Income-tax Act in the scheme.</p>
<p>&quot;The Income Declaration Scheme, 2016 incorporated as Chapter IX of the Finance Bill 2016 and The Direct Tax Dispute Resolution Scheme 2016 incorporated as Chapter X of the Finance Bill 2016 are expected to come into force on the 1st of June, 2016 after the Finance Act 2016 receives the Presidential assent,&quot; the Ministry said.</p>
<p>The Direct Tax Dispute Resolution Scheme is aimed to resolve cases pending in any Court, Tribunal, Arbitration or mediation under the Bilateral Investment Protection Agreement (BIPA).</p>
<p>The Finance Bill was approved by Parliament on Wednesday when the Rajya Sabha returned it after a brief discussion to the Lok Sabha.</p>
<p>These issues/points may be submitted by May 25 at &#39;media.cbdt@gmail.com&#39; or by post to the Central Board of Direct Taxes.</p>
<p>Sanjay Kumar, Senior Advisor, Deloitte in India said the Direct Tax Dispute Resolution Scheme is the new avatar of the earlier scheme brought in the late 1990s, &quot;evokes doubts about whether there will be enough takers because many cases do not have very justified assessment orders based on evidence, and the taxpayers in many cases may get full relief from the appellate authorities.&rdquo;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/new-delhi-29">New Delhi</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/finance-ministry">Finance Ministry</a></li><li><a href="/topic/arun-jaitley">Arun Jaitley</a></li><li><a href="/topic/finance-bill">Finance Bill</a></li><li><a href="/topic/lok-sabha">Lok Sabha</a></li><li><a href="/topic/rajya-sabha">Rajya Sabha</a></li><li><a href="/topic/black-money">Black Money</a></li><li><a href="/topic/income-declaration-scheme">Income Declaration Scheme</a></li><li><a href="/topic/bilateral-investment-protection-agreement-bipa">Bilateral Investment Protection Agreement (BIPA)</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:50am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:50am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Snapdeal invested nearly Rs 1,996 crore in supply chain, logistics over 18-months</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-snapdeal-invested-nearly-rs-1990-crore-in-supply-chain-and-logistics-over-18-months-2211946</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>E-commerce major Snapdeal has pumped in $300 million (about Rs 1,995.8 crore) over the last 18 months to strengthen its supply chain and logistics and facilitate the increase in shipment volumes.</p>
<p>The city-based firm has seen 1.9 times increase in shipment volumes from 1.29 lakh daily shipments last year to 2.5 lakh this year.</p>
<p>&quot;We have seen a significant increase of 1.9 times in shipment volumes. This is on account of increase in assortment on Snapdeal from 12 million to 35 million over the year. We have also expanded our seller base which helped increase shipments,&quot; Snapdeal Chief Customer Experience Officer Jayant Sood said.</p>
<p>He added that reports by PwC and RedSeer Consulting suggest that Snapdeal&#39;s promised delivery time is the shortest across India.</p>
<p>&quot;The number of sellers on our platform has increased three-fold from 1,00,000 at the beginning of 2015 to more than 3,00,000 in 2016... We have invested USD 300 million towards logistics and customer experience,&quot; he said.</p>
<p>He added that the company has 2 million sq ft of warehousing space across 63 sites and 45 cities.</p>
<p>Sood said the seller expansion has also led to a huge increase in the goods available on its platform.</p>
<p>&quot;Unlike other competing marketplaces, which have their own sellers under various arrangements, we have no such conflicting interests. This makes Snapdeal more attractive for sellers,&quot; he said.</p>
<p>He said the company has seen 60% month-on-month increase in FMCG sales while the books category grew by 300%. Also, there is a strong increase in uptake in the home decor category.</p>
<p>&quot;This blend of expansion of high-frequency categories drives high repeat usage, which is enabled by reliable experience each time,&quot; he added.</p>
<p>Besides, sharp focus on repeat users and initiatives like same day refunds is helping Snapdeal &quot;chart a distinct course&quot;, he said.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/new-delhi-29">New Delhi</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/e-commerce">e-commerce</a></li><li><a href="/topic/snapdeal">Snapdeal</a></li><li><a href="/topic/logistics">logistics</a></li><li><a href="/topic/jayant-sood">Jayant Sood</a></li><li><a href="/topic/pwc">PWC</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:45am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:45am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>UN cuts global economic growth forecast for 2016 to 2.4%</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-un-cuts-global-economic-growth-forecast-for-2016-to-24-2211941</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The United Nations on Thursday said it cut its forecast for global economic growth in 2016 by half a percentage point to 2.4%, largely due to downward revisions for Africa, the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS) and Latin America.</p>
<p>In a new report entitled &quot;World Economic Situation and Prospects 2016,&quot; the UN said it has lowered its forecast for growth of world gross product this year to 2.4%, the same as in 2015, from its December forecast of 2.9%.</p>
<p>&quot;Global economic growth prospects for 2017 also remain well below pre-crisis trends, and a protracted period of slow productivity growth and feeble investment weigh on the longer-term potential of the global economy,&quot; it said.</p>
<p>It cited weak demand in developed economies as a major drag on global growth, alongside low commodity prices, mounting fiscal and current-account imbalances and policy tightening in commodity-exporting economies.</p>
<p>Other negative factors, the report said, are &quot;severe weather-related shocks, political challenges and large capital outflows in many developing regions.&quot;</p>
<p>In the CIS region of the former Soviet Union, the report said Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan and Russia will likely see declines in gross domestic product this year and said international sanctions are among the major negative factors for Russia&#39;s economy.</p>
<p>Another important factor is &quot;Brazil being mired in a deeper-than-expected recession,&quot; it said. Concerns about the upcoming referendum on European Union membership in Britain also pose a potential risk for the global economy.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/agencies/reuters">Reuters</a><a href="/cities/united-nations">United Nations</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/commonwealth-of-independent-states">Commonwealth of Independent States</a></li><li><a href="/topic/united-nations">United Nations</a></li><li><a href="/topic/africa">Africa</a></li><li><a href="/topic/european-union">European Union</a></li><li><a href="/topic/russia">Russia</a></li><li><a href="/topic/economic-growth">Economic Growth</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:40am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:40am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Activision Blizzard partners with Facebook to launch eSports broadcasts</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/scitech/report-activision-blizzard-partners-with-facebook-to-launch-esports-broadcasts-2211939</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Activision Blizzard&#39;s Media Networks division plans to use Facebook to expand the gaming giant&#39;s reach and bring eSports, or video-game competitions, to the masses.</p>
<p>The company announced the launch of &quot;new content, broadcast experiences and distribution partnerships for its MLG.tv streaming platform,&quot; which it acquired in December 2015. One of those partnerships is with Facebook, and the inaugural event of their efforts will come at the MLG Anaheim Open, a two-day &quot;Call of Duty: Black Ops III&quot; tournament that starts June 10.</p>
<p>In a statement, the company said: &quot;The collaboration will allow MLG.tv to broadcast live competitions and deliver ESR content to the 1.6 billion people on Facebook.&quot; ESR is MLG&#39;s &quot;eSports report.&quot;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/scitech">Sci/Tech</a><a href="/agencies/afp-relax-news-0">AFP Relax News</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/esports">eSports</a></li><li><a href="/topic/activision-blizzard">Activision Blizzard</a></li><li><a href="/topic/facebook">Facebook</a></li><li><a href="/topic/video-game-competitions">video-game competitions</a></li><li><a href="/topic/major-league-gaming-mlg">Major League Gaming (MLG)</a></li><li><a href="/topic/video-game-streaming">video game streaming</a></li><li><a href="/topic/mlgtv">MLG.tv</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-10:34am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 10:34am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Google trumps Apple to become world's largest company by market share</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-google-trumps-apple-to-become-world-s-largest-company-by-market-share-2211938</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Shares of Apple sank below $90 for the first time in nearly two years, ceding the title of the world&#39;s largest company by market valuation to Google.</p>
<p>With investors souring on the outlook for sales of its market-leading iPhones and iPads, and no new blockbuster consumer electronics product in its offerings, Apple shares fell 3.3% to $89.47 in morning trade, before rebounding slightly back above the $90 threshold.</p>
<p>That left the company&#39;s stock off more than 14% since the beginning of the year and down one-third from the peak of $132.54 one year ago.</p>
<p>Apple stock has slid sharply since mid-April, hit in part by the company&#39;s disappointing first quarter earnings, which showed a decline in revenues and the first quarterly drop ever in iPhone unit sales since launching the smartphone in 2007.</p>
<p>Today&#39;s fall elevated Google parent Alphabet ahead of its Silicon Valley rival as the world&#39;s largest company. At midday Apple&#39;s market valuation was around $494 billion against Alphabet&#39;s $498 billion.</p>
<p>Worries were mounting over the pace of iPhone sales, the company&#39;s top earner, amid reports that consumers worldwide are generally replacing their phones less often than before.</p>
<p>Key Asian producers of components for Apple were also seeing their shares pummelled on the forecast for slower iPhone sales.</p>
<p>And analysts at UBS cut their outlook for Apple&#39;s share price on Wednesday to $115 from $120 on lower sales forecasts.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/san-francisco">San Francisco</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/google">Google</a></li><li><a href="/topic/apple">Apple</a></li><li><a href="/topic/apple-iphone">Apple iPhone</a></li><li><a href="/topic/apple-ipad">Apple iPad</a></li><li><a href="/topic/alphabet">Alphabet</a></li><li><a href="/topic/ubs">UBS</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-10:18am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 10:18am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Breaking records: Rajinikanth's 'Kabali' teaser highest viewed Indian film teaser!</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-breaking-records-rajinikanth-s-kabali-teaser-most-highly-viewed-indian-film-teaser-2211937</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>When the <em>Kabali</em>&nbsp;teaser was released on May 1, no one thought it would break records as quickly as it did. In 22 hours, it crossed 5 million views. Today, the <em>Kabali </em>teaser has achieved another record. It is now reportedly the most viewed Indian film teaser with more than 17.1 million views. The highest records were previously held by Bollywood film <em>Dhoom 3</em>&nbsp;and Salman Khan&#39;s <em>Sultan</em>&nbsp;with just over 17 million views.</p>
<p><em>Kabali </em>stars Superstar Rajinikanth and is directed by Pa Ranjith. The movie is about an ageing don. In the teaser, Rajinikanth says some dialogues which have gone viral now as ringtones. The movie is produced by Kalaipuli S Thanu&nbsp;who said he expected the movie to do tremendous business given the stupendous success the teaser has had. He told <strong>dna </strong>that they expected the teaser to be hit, but not at this level.&nbsp;</p>
<p>News is that the distribution rights for the film are selling at record prices for <em>Kabali</em>. There is a buzz that the audio of the film will release on May 30 and the movie will release on July 1. No official statement has been released regarding this yet.&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Watch the <em>Kabali&nbsp;</em>teaser here:</strong></p>
<p><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9mdJV5-eias" width="560"></iframe></p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/entertainment">Entertainment</a><a href="/authors/dna-web-team">dna Web Team</a><a href="/agencies/dna-webdesk">dna webdesk</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/ranjith">Ranjith</a></li><li><a href="/topic/rajinikanth">Rajinikanth</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kabali">Kabali</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kalaipuli-s-thanu">kalaipuli s thanu</a></li><li><a href="/topic/tamil-films">Tamil Films</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kollywood">Kollywood</a></li><li><a href="/topic/superstar">superstar</a></li><li><a href="/topic/superstar-rajinikanth">Superstar Rajinikanth</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:10am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:10am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Dr Reddy's stock falls nearly 2% on Q4 results disappointment</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/money/report-dr-reddy-s-stock-falls-nearly-2-on-fourth-quarter-disappointment-2211936</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Drug major Dr&nbsp;Reddy&#39;s&nbsp;Laboratories&nbsp;stock fell nearly 2% after the company reported 85.6%&nbsp;decline in consolidated net profit to&nbsp;Rs&nbsp;74.6 crore for the March quarter on account of provisioning for outstanding receivables from the Venezuelan market on Thursday.</p>
<p>At 1136 hours, the stock was dealing at&nbsp;Rs&nbsp;2,922.20, down&nbsp;Rs&nbsp;51.65 or 1.74% on the&nbsp;BSE&nbsp;and on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), the stock was dealing at&nbsp;Rs&nbsp;2,921.80, down&nbsp;Rs&nbsp;49.65 or 1.67%.</p>
<p>The company had reported Rs 518.8 crore net profit for the same quarter last fiscal, the company&#39;s President, CFO and Global Head of HR Saumen Chakraborty said.</p>
<p>Consolidated net income from sales and services declined to Rs 3,756.2 crore for the quarter under review as against Rs 3,870.4 crore in the year-ago period.</p>
<p>&quot;This (provisioning) is largely due to the rules in the Venezuelan market. We are not able to repatriate full amount from the market due to rules. We are getting some. We made provisioning of about Rs 430 crore during the quarter. That has impacted the net,&quot; Chakraborty added.</p>
<p>He also said the revenues have been impacted due to Ruble&#39;s depreciation against world currencies.</p>
<p>Dr Reddy&#39;s Co-chairman and CEO G V Prasad said it has been a challenging quarter for the company.</p>
<p>&quot;While there is a marginal decline in revenues, there is a greater impact on profitability. This is mainly due to the provision, made as a matter of abundant precaution, to write down our outstanding receivables from Venezuela,&quot; Prasad said.</p>
<p>For the fiscal ended March, the company posted a net profit of Rs 2,001.3 crore as against Rs 2,217.9 crore in the same period a year earlier.</p>
<p>Consolidated net income from sales and services during 2015-16 stood at Rs 15,470.8 crore, compared to Rs 14,818.9 crore in the previous fiscal.</p>
<p>Revenues from North America for generics grew by 19% to Rs 7,540 crore during 2015-16.</p>
<p>&quot;The company made 14 filings (13 ANDA and 1 NDA) during FY16. Cumulatively, 82 generic filings are pending for approval with USFDA,&quot; Chakraborty said.</p>
<p>Revenues (generics) from Russia declined by 29% to Rs 1,060 crore in the fiscal mainly on account of ruble depreciation.</p>
<p>Generics revenue from India grew by 19% to Rs 2,130 crore while the same from rest of the world declined by 28% to Rs 940 crore on account of &quot;calibrated&quot; sales in Venezuela.</p>
<p>Revenues from pharmaceutical services and active ingredients fell by 12% to Rs 2,240 crore on account of USFDA warning letters for three of its facilities.</p>
<p>Replying to query on the status of the warning letters, Prasad said the company is in the process of implementing the quality improvement programme across its plants.</p>
<p>&quot;After we finish that, the USFDA will come and visit the plants. It would take a few months,&quot; Prasad said without specifying the time-frame.</p>
<p>The company spent Rs 1,780 crore on research and development during the last fiscal.</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/money">Money</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/hyderabad-0">Hyderabad</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/venezuela">Venezuela</a></li><li><a href="/topic/bse">BSE</a></li><li><a href="/topic/national-stock-exchange">National Stock Exchange</a></li><li><a href="/topic/dr-reddy-s-laboratories">Dr Reddy&#039;s Laboratories</a></li><li><a href="/topic/saumen-chakraborty">Saumen Chakraborty</a></li><li><a href="/topic/g-v-prasad">G V Prasad</a></li><li><a href="/topic/usfda">USFDA</a></li><li><a href="/topic/pharmaceuticals">Pharmaceuticals</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-11:36am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 11:36am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>New Delhi: Serial sex offender arrested for raping a four-year-old</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-new-delhi-serial-sex-offender-arrested-for-raping-a-four-year-old-2211934</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Police on Thursday said a 20-year-old man, who was arrested for the alleged rape of a four-year-old girl at a transit camp in Chanakyapuri area in New Delhi last week, allegedly sexually assaulted at least four other girls at the same place.</p>
<p>Ronnie sexually assaulted at least four other girls, aged between 10 and 12 years, residing at the transit camp. He was arrested only after his latest victim, the four-year-old daughter of a neighbour, reported the matter to her parents, who raised an alarm, they said.</p>
<p>During interrogation, Ronnie made certain disclosures and when police teams, comprising women, were sent to the transit camp to talk to people there, four unreported cases emerged, police said.&nbsp;&quot;The accused has now been booked in four fresh cases under POCSO Act,&quot; DCP (New Delhi) Jatin Narwal said.</p>
<p>Police are trying to ascertain if Ronnie had assaulted more girls in and around the transit camp.&nbsp;Meanwhile, all the minor victims identified so far have been given counselling in the presence of their parents, police added.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/india">India</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/new-delhi-29">New Delhi</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/protection-of-children-from-sexual-offences-act-pocso">Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act (POCSO)</a></li><li><a href="/topic/new-delhi">NEW DELHI</a></li><li><a href="/topic/rape">rape</a></li><li><a href="/topic/sexually-assaulted">sexually assaulted</a></li><li><a href="/topic/chanakyapuri">Chanakyapuri</a></li><li><a href="/topic/crimes-against-women">Crimes against women</a></li><li><a href="/topic/crimes-against-minors">crimes against minors</a></li><li><a href="/topic/violence-against-minors">violence against minors</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-10:45am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 10:45am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Yoga, meditation may reduce Alzheimer's risk: study</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/health/report-yoga-meditation-may-reduce-alzheimer-s-risk-study-2211932</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Yoga and meditation practise may help minimise the cognitive and emotional problems that often precede Alzheimer&#39;s disease, according to a new study.</p>
<p>Researchers found that yoga and meditation are even more effective than memory enhancement exercises like crosswords.&nbsp;They found that a three-month course of yoga and meditation practise helped minimise the cognitive and emotional problems that often precede Alzheimer&#39;s and other forms of dementia - and that it was even more effective than the memory enhancement exercises that have been considered the gold standard for managing mild cognitive impairment.</p>
<p>&quot;Memory training was comparable to yoga with meditation in terms of improving memory, but yoga provided a broader benefit than memory training because it also helped with mood, anxiety and coping skills,&quot; said Helen Lavretsky from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) in the US.</p>
<p>People with mild cognitive impairment are two-and-a-half times more likely to develop Alzheimer&#39;s disease and other forms of dementia, researchers said.&nbsp;The study is the first to compare outcomes from yoga and meditation with those from memory training, which incorporates activities ranging from crossword puzzles to commercially available computer programmes.</p>
<p>The research of 25 participants, all over the age of 55, measured changes not just in behaviour but also in brain activity.&nbsp;Researchers studied participants who had reported issues with their memory, such as tendencies to forget names, faces or appointments or to misplace things. Subjects underwent memory tests and brain scans at the beginning and end of the study.</p>
<p>Out of the participants, 11 received one hour a week of memory enhancement training and spent 20 minutes a day performing memory exercises - verbal and visual association and other practical strategies for improving memory, based on research-backed techniques.</p>
<p>The other 14 participants took a one-hour class once a week in yoga and practised meditation at home for 20 minutes each day.&nbsp;After 12 weeks, there were similar improvements among participants in both groups in verbal memory skills - which come into play for remembering names and lists of words.&nbsp;But those who had practised yoga and meditation had better improvements than the other subjects in visual-spatial memory skills, which come into play for recalling locations and navigating while walking or driving.</p>
<p>The yoga-meditation group also had better results in terms of reducing depression and anxiety and improving coping skills and resilience to stress, which is important because coming to terms with cognitive impairment can be emotionally difficult, researchers said.</p>
<p>The findings were published in the<em> Journal of Alzheimer&#39;s Disease.&nbsp;</em></p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/health">Health</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/los-angeles-1">Los Angeles</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/university-of-california">University of California</a></li><li><a href="/topic/mild-cognitive-impairment">Mild Cognitive Impairment</a></li><li><a href="/topic/yoga">Yoga</a></li><li><a href="/topic/meditation">meditation</a></li><li><a href="/topic/health">Health</a></li><li><a href="/topic/alzheimer">Alzheimer</a></li><li><a href="/topic/dementia">dementia</a></li><li><a href="/topic/memory-enhancement">memory enhancement</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-12:03pm</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 12:03pm</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">
  <div class="content">

<item>
 <title>Sonam Kapoor to attend amfAR Gala; Aishwarya Rai Bachchan to give it a miss</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-sonam-kapoor-to-attend-amfar-gala-aishwarya-rai-bachchan-to-give-it-a-miss-2211929</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Actress Sonam Kapoor is set to attend the amfAR GALA at the Cannes Film Festival.</p>
<p>This will be the 30-year-old <em>Neerja</em>&nbsp;actress&#39; first appearance at the prestigious &#39;Cinema Against AIDS&#39; fundraiser.</p>
<p>&quot;It&#39;s an honour to be a part of the esteemed amfAR gala. I cannot stress enough the importance of AIDS research in our time. This foundation is doing such incredible work dedicated towards raising funds for life-saving research programs that help the fight against AIDS. I am looking forward to meeting the wonderful team that chairs amfAR and hope to contribute to this cause in every way possible,&quot; Sonam said in a statement.</p>
<p>Other prominent names to attend the gala event are Helen Mirren, Sharon Stone, Katy Perry, Kenneth Cole, Lewis Hamilton, Isabeli Fontana, Barbara Palvin and Irina Shayk.</p>
<p>Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, who has been a regular at the fundraiser, will be giving it a miss this year due to her professional commitments.</p>
<p>In her sixth visit to the Cannes, Sonam will attend various parties, film premieres and charity dinners.&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/entertainment">Entertainment</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/cannes">Cannes</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/sonam-kapoor">Sonam Kapoor</a></li><li><a href="/topic/aishwarya-rai-bachchan-0">Aishwarya Rai Bachchan</a></li><li><a href="/topic/cannes-2016">Cannes 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/cannes-film-festival-2016">Cannes Film Festival 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/cannes-film-festival">Cannes Film Festival</a></li><li><a href="/topic/amfar-gala">AmfAR Gala</a></li><li><a href="/topic/helen-mirren">Helen Mirren</a></li><li><a href="/topic/irina-shayk">Irina Shayk</a></li><li><a href="/topic/katy-perry">Katy Perry</a></li><li><a href="/topic/lewis-hamilton">Lewis Hamilton</a></li><li><a href="/topic/sharon-stone">Sharon Stone</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-10:15am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 10:15am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title>Haryana: Jat reservation notification all set to be issued</title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-haryana-jat-reservation-notification-to-be-issued-today-2211927</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Haryana government will issue the notification for Jat reservation on Friday.</p>
<p>Formalities in this regard were being completed and the notification would be issued on Friday, official sources said in Chandigarh. Notably, on March 29, the Haryana Assembly had unanimously passed a Bill to provide reservation to Jats and five other communities in government jobs and educational institutions.</p>
<p>Haryana Backward Classes (Reservation in Services and Admission in Educational Institutions) Bill, 2016, had proposed to give statutory status to Backward classes Block &#39;A&#39;, Backward classes Block &#39;B&#39;, and Backward classes Block &#39;C&#39;.&nbsp;The Bill had proposed to give reservation to Jats and five other castes - Jat Sikhs, Rors, Bishnois, Tyagis and Mulla Jat/Muslim Jat by constituting a new classification Block &#39;C&#39; in the Backward Classes category.</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/india">India</a><a href="/agencies/pti">PTI</a><a href="/cities/chandigarh-1">Chandigarh</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/jat-agitation">Jat agitation</a></li><li><a href="/topic/jat-reservation">Jat reservation</a></li><li><a href="/topic/haryana-government">Haryana Government</a></li><li><a href="/topic/haryana-assembly">Haryana Assembly</a></li><li><a href="/topic/backward-classes">Backward Classes</a></li><li><a href="/topic/jat-sikhs">Jat Sikhs</a></li><li><a href="/topic/bishnois">Bishnois</a></li><li><a href="/topic/tyagis">Tyagis</a></li><li><a href="/topic/muslim-jats">Muslim Jats</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-10:55am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 10:55am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">

<item>
 <title> karresults.nic.in, kseeb.kar.nic.in KSEEB 10th SSLC Results 2016: Karnataka Board Class 10th X SSLC Exam Result 2016 to be declared shortly </title>
 <link>http://www.dnaindia.com/india/report-karresultsnicin-kseebkarnicin-kseeb-10th-sslc-results-2016-karnataka-board-class-10th-x-sslc-exam-result-2016-to-be-declared-shortly-2211925</link>
 <description><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The long wait of candidates who appeared for the &nbsp;KSEEB Class 10th&nbsp;exam is almost over. The&nbsp;Karnataka&nbsp;Secondary Education Examination Board (KSEEB) will be announcing&nbsp;KSEEB SSLC Results 2016 shortly. According to some reports, the result may be out at 10am, though there is no official confirmation about it.&nbsp;</p>
<p>This year the exam was held between&nbsp;March 30 to April 13. Nearly 8.5 lakh students gave the exam as per official website of KSEEB. Now just a month after the completion of exams, students will be getting their final results.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Last year the result was published on May 12. In 2015, pass percentage for&nbsp;Karnataka SSLC Results was 81.82%. Girls fared better than the boys. Udupi district had the best pass percentage.&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Facts about Karnataka&nbsp;Secondary Education Examination Board​(&nbsp;KSEEB):</h3>
<p>KSEEB&nbsp;came into existence in 1966 and every year in April over 8&nbsp;lakh&nbsp;students and in June over 1&nbsp;lakh&nbsp;students appear for the&nbsp;SSLC&nbsp;examinations.</p>
<p>The board has decided to improve the evaluation system and the results, has set up divisional offices of the Board.&nbsp;</p>
<h3>How to check KSEEB SSLC results 2016 :</h3>
<p>&nbsp;Log on to either &nbsp;<a href="http://kseeb.kar.nic.in/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">www.kseeb.kar.nic.in</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href="http://karresults.nic.in/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">www.karresults.nic.in</a></p>
<p>&nbsp;You have to enter roll number and date or birth</p>
<p>Click on submit to get the results</p>
<p>Take a printout of the results for future reference</p>
<p>Schools will be providing marksheets later</p>
<p>All the best to the students!!&nbsp;</p>
</div></div></div><a href="/slug/report">Report</a><a href="/india">India</a><a href="/authors/dna-web-team">dna Web Team</a><a href="/agencies/dna-webdesk">dna webdesk</a><ul><li><a href="/topic/kseebkarnicin">kseeb.kar.nic.in</a></li><li><a href="/topic/karresultsnicin">karresults.nic.in</a></li><li><a href="/topic/sslc-result-2016">SSLC Result 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kseeb-results-2016">KSEEB Results 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kseeb-sslc-results-2016">KSEEB SSLC Results 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kseeb-10th-result-2016">KSEEB 10th Result 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/karnataka-sslc-results-2016">Karnataka SSLC Results 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/karnataka-class-10th-results-2016">Karnataka Class 10th Results 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/karnataka-board-result-2016">Karnataka Board Result 2016</a></li><li><a href="/topic/kseeb-class-10th-x-result-2016">KSEEB Class 10th X Result 2016</a></li></ul><div class="field field-name-field-date-published field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Fri, 13 May 2016-09:40am</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-date-updated field-type-datestamp field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Date updated:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">Friday, 13 May 2016 - 9:40am</span></div></div></div><div class="field-collection-container clearfix"><div class="field field-name-field-article-images field-type-field-collection field-label-above"><div class="field-label">Article Images:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="field-collection-view clearfix view-mode-full field-collection-view-final"><div class="entity entity-field-collection-item field-collection-item-field-article-images clearfix">
